...and that there is her little pink scooter.
And you, do you like to travel?
Have you ever taken an airplane?
Do you like to go exploring too?
Have you ever walked on a volcano in Asia...
Would you like to pat a toucan in South America?
If so, then follow Enya on her little pink scooter.
She will bring you all around the world to visit all the seven continents.
You will see, it really is a lot of fun to travel.
